Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.application.tb0823.toolrental.controller.GlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Author:
Theodore Belanger This Global Exception handler is leveraged by the tool rental controller
